After leaving a request we will contact: After leaving a request we will contact you and offer you to fill in the specification, in which you will have to specify in detail the required goods and their features.
We will search for manufacturers of the: We will search for manufacturers of the required goods within three days. After that we will contact you and present the terms and conditions offered by them. The first three products found will be found for you free of charge.
We make calculations on logistics and ou: We make calculations on logistics and our commission, specifying at once whether you need additional warehouse services such as barcoding, checking the goods for defects and so on
If you agree to our co-operation, you pa: If you agree to our co-operation, you pay the cost of goods and the cost of our services.

If the purchase price of an item is belo: If the purchase price of an item is below the minimum threshold of $5,000, our minimum commission is $600.  Are you satisfied with these conditions?

Searching up to 3 products is free of ch: Searching up to 3 products is free of charge, then for each product $3 . - If you meet the minimum threshold of $5,000 or more, our commission ranges from 3% to 12% depending on the amount and complexity of the work. If the purchase price is below the minimum threshold of $5,000, our minimum commission is $600.
- There are several ways to ship goods f: - There are several ways to ship goods from China:
Sea freight - this is the most popular w: Sea freight - this is the most popular way to ship large shipments from China.
Railways - more popular for shipping car: Railways - more popular for shipping cargo from China, especially for medium-sized cargo.
Air transport - the fastest, but also mo: Air transport - the fastest, but also more expensive option for delivery of cargo from China.
Road transport - the speed is inferior t: Road transport - the speed is inferior to air transport, used for delivery of medium and small-sized cargo from China.
- Delivery time may vary depending on ma: - Delivery time may vary depending on many factors, including distance, customs procedures and other circumstances, you can check with our manager.
How much does logistics cost? To China/t: How much does logistics cost? To China/to my country?
- To China - depends on the location of: - To China - depends on the location of the factory, the further the factory is from our warehouse/shipping port, the more expensive it is.
- To my country - there is no certain ra: - To my country - there is no certain rate for KG, each product is calculated separately, you need to understand the dimensions of the cargo and its weight, what type of goods, route and many other factors. All this is calculated individually.
-Yes, there are some seasonal difficulti: -Yes, there are some seasonal difficulties that can affect the delivery of goods from China:
Chinese New Year: During Chinese New Yea: Chinese New Year: During Chinese New Year celebrations (usually in February), many businesses, including factories and warehouses, suspend operations for several weeks. This can cause delays in the production and dispatch of goods.
Peak seasons: During periods of high dem: Peak seasons: During periods of high demand, such as Christmas, Black Friday or other major global events, there can be a high volume of cargo traffic, resulting in delays in deliveries due to congested ports, warehouses and vehicles.
Weather conditions: Some modes of transp: Weather conditions: Some modes of transport may face difficulties due to weather conditions, especially in winter, which can lead to delays in delivery.
It is important to keep these seasonal f: It is important to keep these seasonal factors in mind when planning shipments from China and factor them into your delivery schedule.
- Everything will be fair due to the fol: - Everything will be fair due to the following guarantees:
Contract: Conclusion of a written contra: Contract: Conclusion of a written contract that clearly spells out all the terms of co-operation, rights and obligations of each party.
Adherence to Laws: Assurance that partne: Adherence to Laws: Assurance that partners and suppliers follow the law and international standards in their activities.
Transparency: Providing accountability a: Transparency: Providing accountability and transparency in the document flow, which allows to control the supply chain and operations.
